Desc.eng: I’ve received word that Professor Fulmigati has developed a new type of poisonous gas and he plans to flood the whole city with it.
And why would he do that? That’s insane.
Which part of the “mad scientist” did you miss earlier?
“Though this be madness, but there is method in it”! The gas affects everyone and turns them into mindless slaves. Even me, which would be a disgrace, really.
So what should we do about it?

Fulmigati is planning a test. He means to use an experimental machine to flood the sewers. You must find it and destroy the whole apparatus. And if you will permit me to offer a little advice… Don’t forget to take your… medicaments with you.
